entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is yelling and trying to convince Lupin that Sirius is alive.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A character who is fighting with Harry. He believes Sirius is dead.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend who is hiding behind a curtain and is believed to be dead by Lupin.

relationships.description: Harry is arguing with Lupin about whether Sirius is alive or not.
Harry believes that Sirius is his friend and is trying to convince Lupin of this.
Lupin believes that Sirius is dead.
Harry is concerned about the well-being of Sirius and wants him to emerge from behind the curtain.
